name: Monkeys Vs Bird
description:
The Bird is not happy because some monkeys have stolen it's eggs.

Help the bird to get to its egg safely.

But remember you have limited number of jumps (steps) available to reach the eggs safely.

~ Exciting physics based levels.
~ 6 Different birds to choose from.
~ Collect Coins and unlock new birds.
~ Collect Extra Jumps, Lives and Golden Eggs.
~ Lots of Fun and very Addictive.

Become a fan of Monkeys vs Bird on Facebook:
www.facebook.com/pages/Angry-Monkeys-vs-Bird/268067646677127

Just keep playing and enjoying!!!
